texts.name: Jean Cesar
texts.biography: Jean Cesar's best friend was dead in the disaster. It changed the heart for the man who used to be devoutness. After that, he has become increasingly insane and inaccessible. People said his intention of revenge has already destroys his remained benovolent.

specialty.description: Casts Fireball with damage increased by 3% for every N hero levels, where N is the level of the target creature.
